traveler.name: The Traveler
traveler.description: An adventurous explorer with a keen eye for detail and a passion for discovering hidden cultural treasures.
traveler.background: Having backpacked across 40 countries, the Traveler has developed a sixth sense for finding authentic local experiences off the beaten path. Their journal is filled with sketches and notes from countless adventures.

special_abilities.name: Wayfinder
special_abilities.description: Can reveal one hidden pathway or shortcut in each region.

special_abilities.name: Cultural Intuition
special_abilities.description: Receives an extra hint for pattern-matching puzzles.

special_abilities.name: Photographic Memory
special_abilities.description: Can temporarily reveal a completed puzzle's solution to reference later.

traveler.character_quote: Every alley has a story, every craftsman a secret technique—I'm here to discover them all.

artist.name: The Artist
artist.description: A creative soul with deep appreciation for colors, patterns, and the techniques behind traditional crafts.
artist.background: Formally trained in Western art traditions but drawn to the geometric precision and vibrant palette of Islamic art. The Artist seeks to understand the cultural meaning behind Moroccan visual expressions.

special_abilities.name: Color Sense
special_abilities.description: Automatically solves one color-related puzzle component in each region.

special_abilities.name: Pattern Recognition
special_abilities.description: Reveals the structure or organization principle behind complex patterns.

special_abilities.name: Creative Solution
special_abilities.description: Can skip one step in crafting or assembly puzzles.

artist.character_quote: The soul of Morocco lives in its colors—the blue of Chefchaouen, the red of Marrakech, the gold of the Sahara.

historian.name: The Historian
historian.description: A knowledgeable scholar specializing in North African history, culture, and languages.
historian.background: After years in academia, the Historian now travels the world documenting endangered cultural practices and translating ancient texts. Their expertise in Amazigh, Arabic, and medieval trade routes provides unique insights into Moroccan heritage.

special_abilities.name: Ancient Languages
special_abilities.description: Automatically translates one text or script in each region.

special_abilities.name: Historical Context
special_abilities.description: Reveals additional background information that helps solve puzzles.

special_abilities.name: Cultural Expertise
special_abilities.description: Can skip one cultural knowledge question in each region.

historian.character_quote: Each artifact tells a story of cultural exchange—Morocco stands at the crossroads of African, Arab, and European civilizations.

musician.name: The Musician
musician.description: A talented ethnomusicologist who studies and performs traditional Moroccan music forms.
musician.background: Trained in both Western classical and various world music traditions, the Musician has spent years learning from master performers across Morocco, from Gnawa musicians in the south to Andalusian orchestras in Fes.

special_abilities.name: Perfect Pitch
special_abilities.description: Automatically solves one music or sound-based puzzle in each region.

special_abilities.name: Rhythm Master
special_abilities.description: Can identify and reproduce complex rhythm patterns in puzzles.

special_abilities.name: Cultural Ear
special_abilities.description: Recognizes regional musical styles and instruments, providing additional context clues.

musician.character_quote: Morocco's soul resonates through its rhythms—from the hypnotic beats of Gnawa to the complex melodies of Andalusian orchestras.
